Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common

Class ClassMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.common.ClassMethods
  • public class ClassMethods
extends Object
    Methods for inspecting types.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static String getArrayTypeName​(Object array)
      Returns a description of the type of the specified array, including the fully-qualified name of the array's component type.
      static String getArrayTypeSimpleName​(Object array)
      Returns a description of the type of the specified array, including the simple name of the array's component type.
      static Field getField​(Object obj, String fieldName)
      Returns a Field object corresponding to the provided field name within the provided object's type.
      static boolean isA​(Class<?> classToTest, Class<?> superOrInterface)
      Tests whether the 1st argument extends or implements the 2nd argument.
      static boolean isA​(Object objectToTest, Class<?> superOrInterface)
      Tests whether the 1st argument is an instance of the 2nd argument.
      static boolean isPrimitiveArray​(Object obj)
      Tests whether the provided object is an array of primitives without using reflection.

    • Method Detail

      • isA

        public static boolean isA​(Class<?> classToTest,
                          Class<?> superOrInterface)
        Tests whether the 1st argument extends or implements the 2nd argument. In case you keep forgetting who should be the caller and who the callee with Class.isAssignableFrom method.
        Parameters:
        classToTest -
        superOrInterface -
        Returns:

      • isPrimitiveArray

        public static boolean isPrimitiveArray​(Object obj)
        Tests whether the provided object is an array of primitives without using reflection. Null-safe.
        Parameters:
        obj -
        Returns:

      • getArrayTypeName

        public static String getArrayTypeName​(Object array)
        Returns a description of the type of the specified array, including the fully-qualified name of the array's component type. For example getArrayTypeName(myStringArray) will return "java.lang.String[]", which is a bit less harsh than the description produced by myStringArray.toString()
        Parameters:
        array - The array
        Returns:
        The simple name of the array type

      • getArrayTypeSimpleName

        public static String getArrayTypeSimpleName​(Object array)
        Returns a description of the type of the specified array, including the simple name of the array's component type. For example getArrayTypeSimpleName(myStringArray) will return "String[]", which is a bit less harsh than the description produced by myStringArray.toString()
        Parameters:
        array - The array
        Returns:
        The simple name of the array type

      • getField

        public static Field getField​(Object obj,
                             String fieldName)
        Returns a Field object corresponding to the provided field name within the provided object's type. The fields accessible flag will be set to true.
        Parameters:
        obj -
        fieldName -
        Returns:
